content: in this legal case the tribunal of perugia made a final ruling after a 15year duration the dispute involved bn who was the separated wife of flg requesting a reduction in her share of the inheritance the tribunal granted the request and ordered the reinstatement of bns share which is limited to 13 of the total estate the case will continue with further proceedings to determine the total inheritance and division of the estate the court applied article 548 of the civil code which grants a reserved benefit to a separated spouse the opposing party argued against the request but the court considered previous hearings and authorized deductions to determine the injury entitlement due to bn bns attorney requested the continuation of the judgment and the division of jointlyowned property the case began when flg sued the court of perugia for the division of coowned property after the dissolution of the legal communion with bn after flgs death bn filed an action for reduction based on alleged injury to her legitimacy as a separated spouse the court ordered a hearing to clarify the reduction request which eventually took place in june 2019 the court determined that the reduction request was wellfounded and ordered the reinstatement of bns rightful share of the estate the case will now proceed with the identification of the total inheritance and the division of the estate the costs of the case were finalized the ruling was made on december 31 2019 by the president of the tribunal tg
